title: Seeing a dead patient in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead patient in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a dead patient sick in a dream is one of the visions that many people search for, as many can see this vision in a dream, which often makes him feel afraid and anxious because of its importance to him, and the dream. A person can see it in more than one situation, so it is necessary to search for each case of seeing a sick, deceased person in a dream separately through the different site. Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream. Whoever saw in a dream a dead person lying in the hospital, then the dream was an indication that the dead person is shortening his relationship. With his friends and relatives and he needs a lot of prayers and charity in his soul. But if the deceased in the dream was lying in the hospital and in a lot of pain, then the dream was an indication that this person borrowed from another person and did not repay those debts and one must strive to repay them. A blessing or grace time. But if the dreamer sees in the dream that his deceased mother was sick in the hospital, then this is a vision that carries many bad meanings and means that the dreamer will be exposed to many crises because he came to him in the dream to warn him. About what was happening to him. As for the fact that the deceased was the father and the dreamer saw him while he was sick in the hospital suffering from pain, this is a sign that troubles and disasters are coming to the dreamer and he must be careful. Seeing a dead patient in a dream and then death. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person is sick and complains of Headache, then the dream was an indication of the dead person’s shortcomings in his life in many tasks and that the dreamer must pray over him and give him alms. A blessing or a time of grace. The leading interpretation scholars also interpreted the dream as a sign that the dreamer is disrespectful to his parents or to the Lord of the Worlds, and he must repent to God and turn back from what he is doing. As for the one who saw in her dream that the dead woman was sick and unconscious, her dreams indicate that the dead person has committed a lot. Of the sins in his life, as it indicated the girl’s disobedience to her world. As for whoever saw in a dream or a dead person who became sick and died, the dream indicates that he behaved in a shameful way that made that dead person sad in his grave, and perhaps it was a negligence in his duty to God Almighty, and God knows best. Seeing the dead in a dream And they have a fever. Whoever saw in a dream that a deceased person had a fever and a sharp rise in temperature was a sign that he was in debt and had to pay his debts as quickly as possible. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a dead patient in a dream as a financial crisis for the dreamer, and a sign of his negligence in matters of his religion and his relationship with his Lord. Whoever sees that one of his dead relatives has a high temperature in a dream, the dream indicates that this woman suffers from many of the defects that she suffers from and she must try to get rid of them and change them for the better. In general, seeing a dead person sick in a dream is evidence of his intense need for prayers and charity. His soul, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a dead father in a dream is a sick matter Seeing a dead father sick in a dream means that he is very worried about his children and that one of them is going through a problem or crisis that may lead to severe fatigue and it is also an indication that the deceased He is tortured by his Lord. In his grave and many pleas.dreaming

title: Interpretation of a dream about surviving a fall from a high place in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about surviving a fall from a high place in a dream: Seeing a fall in a dream causes a lot of panic and fear. As for the vision of surviving a fall, it expresses the extent of safety and reassurance, and this vision also has many connotations whose interpretations vary based on many things. Interpreters go on to list many symbols that indicate the true meaning of this vision. In this article, we will explain all the meanings and symbols in more detail, taking into account whether the fortuneteller is a man or a single or married woman, and now he will get to know him.Interpretation of a dream about surviving a fall from a high place in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about surviving a fall from a high place in a dream. Falling from high places in general expresses many transformations and changes that occur in the viewer's life in a way that he may not bear at first, due to his complete inability to adapt to the new developments that occur. In it. But if he sees that he survived the fall, then the vision is an indicator of the ability to adapt on the one hand and on the other hand to reach the state that suits him and through which many goals can be achieved. Who has lost the ability to succeed during the transitional phase of his life. This vision also indicates a more stable and stable period and entering into new experiences that do not threaten stability as much as they stabilize its foundations and guarantee a peaceful and normal life. If the dreamer is wealthy, and sees himself falling in his dream, this is an indication of His situation will change for the worse, and he will enter a cycle that is difficult to escape from. He may lose many projects and contracts, and his money will decrease to the point where he cannot live. If he sees salvation from the fall, this vision expresses the miracle that happened at the last minute or the opportunity. The last one that allowed him to get out of this period without major loss, and in this case he must reconsider himself and correct the mistakes that were the cause of this deterioration. But if the dreamer is poor, then seeing a fall or surviving a fall symbolizes a change in his condition for the better. , in terms of livelihood and abundant life after poverty and distress, and this abundance is not only in this world. And even in his religion. The vision of a fall also indicates the presence of many shortcomings in the personality of the visionary, and in terms of surviving the fall, it indicates hard work to deal with these shortcomings and putting more effort into building internally and externally. If the dreamer is a student, then this vision indicates The hard efforts made by a person to achieve his ambition, and this vision assures him that all his goals are being achieved, and that there is no obstacle to achieving what he wants. The vision could be a sign of getting out of a major dilemma or solving a very complex issue, finding appropriate solutions to the problems the dreamer faces in his life, and showing insight and wisdom in all other events and situations he is exposed to. His whole day. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high position and remaining father.

title: The 20 most famous interpretations of seeing sugar in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing buying sugar in a dream? It indicates goodness and wealth. Interpretation of seeing eating sugar in a dream? Elements of glory and a lot of money. What is the interpretation of sugar falling from the bag? It indicates loss for this fortuneteller. Interpretation of seeing buying sugar in one girl’s dream? Evidence of The success of some of the things you do. What is the interpretation of seeing sugarcane juice? Evidence of changing this marital life for the better. Interpretation of seeing sugar in a dream: Seeing yourself buying sugar in a dream indicates good luck and wealth. Then selling sugar in a dream is also evidence of good treatment and the arrival of goodness. Whoever dreams that he bought sugar and at the same time went to sell it, this is bad and the vision is not good. Therefore, dreaming of eating sugar is a sign of honor and a lot of money. Seeing haunted sugar in a dream is a sign of bad news. Seeing yourself selling sugar in a dream to Nablus. Seeing yourself selling sugar in A dream is not a good thing. When a man dreams that he is selling sugar, he is unhappy in his life. Seeing sugar in a dream is often a cause for concern. Then seeing sugar falling from the bag, this indicates a loss to this fortuneteller, but it will be compensated soon. Seeing sugar indicates Vegetarianism in a dream indicates that the dreamer is loyal. So dreaming of chewing sugar is an indication of a lot of useless talk. Sugar is good news for good news, especially if it is white in color unlike brown sugar. Seeing the sugar market for individuals. Buying sugar in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence On the success of some of the things that you do. So, seeing a girl in a dream giving her sugar is a sign of joy and happiness and she may get married in the near future. If a girl sees sugar in a dream, this is an indication that she will travel to a country to earn a living. Then distribute the sugar to the girl In the dream, it is evidence of her engagement in the near future. Interpretation of sugar juice for a married woman: Sugar in a married woman’s dream indicates the happy married life she lives with her husband. After that, seeing brown sugar in jelly for a married woman is evidence of some difficulties that she will face. Hence, seeing juice Sugar cane is evidence that this married woman’s life is changing for the better. Selling sugar in a married woman’s dream indicates disagreements that will arise with her husband. Interpretation of sugar consumption for pregnant women Eating sugar in a pregnancy dream is evidence of the prosperity of the life she lives. Then sugar in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of Salah Ibn Salih. Then seeing a piece of sugar is evidence of the presence of a male child.

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a single woman

preview.html: Therefore, we will provide a detailed interpretation of this dream from the Interpreter’s website, which is the largest dream interpretation site in the world, for singles, married people, pregnant women, divorced people, men and young people. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees herself buying new shoes in In a dream, this is a good omen for her to connect with a good man with good character in the near future. At other times, it may mean positive changes in her life that will bring her happiness and prosperity. Also, buying new shoes in anyone’s dream indicates your feeling of love towards a specific person. Buying her high-heeled shoes in a dream is a sign that she will be promoted at work and obtain a prominent position. The golden shoes indicate her relationship with a man who enjoys prestige and power. When a single woman dreams that she is buying wide shoes in a dream, it indicates this girl’s narrow and superficial view of things. Buying new white shoes in her dream means that she will fulfill all her hopes. Black shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman indicate her trip to work elsewhere. This vision may indicate that her life will change for the better as a result of the right decisions that this girl made without hesitation. See also: Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes. Interpretation of seeing buying new shoes in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is buying new shoes in a dream, this is good news for her that all her hopes will come true. Buying shoes indicates her desire to get rid of the monotony of her life and not renew herself. Other times she sees them. She buys bronze shoes, this indicates her high morals. A red shoe in her dream expresses her relationship with her husband, which is romantic. She is the subject of her husband’s attention and care. Black shoes in her dream herald her high status in a new job. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her her shoes, this is good news. Sarah for an imminent pregnancy. When she dreams that she is buying shoes in a dream, this indicates her emotional and family stability. Buying golden shoes in a married woman’s dream is a good omen, as a new business or inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman buying shoes In a dream, it means that positive changes will occur in that woman’s life that will make her life better. Sometimes this vision expresses good morals and good behavior towards those around her. White shoes in a divorced woman’s dream indicate that she has overcome the problems she was going through as a result of her previous marriage. If she sees A woman is buying black shoes in a dream. This indicates that her ex-husband is causing her many problems, but God is helping her overcome them. The green shoe heralds her transition to a new stage in her life. Read also: Buying black shoes in a dream for married, single, and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about buying shoes New in a man’s dream and its meaning. If a man sees in a dream that he is buying new shoes, this means that he has achieved all the hopes he wants to achieve. This vision may indicate that he will move to work in a new place.

title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The girl in a dream has many interpretations that the dreamer is confused about, so we have provided in this article some clues that make him realize what he wants and know which of them has an indication of evil and which of them indicates good. What is the interpretation of a dream about a girl in a dream? Dream interpretation books explain that seeing a girl in a dream generally indicates comfort and abundant food, in addition to having fair children with their parents. Al-Nabulsi mentions in a dream that if you see a little girl in a dream, this is a sign of pleasure, happiness and enjoyment that he will find in many days. The girl in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin narrates that seeing a girl in a dream is evidence of goodness and abundance and that the dreamer will have a complete new life. If a person wants to obtain a great position and dreams of a girl in his dream, this proves that he has achieved what he wants and wants, and if the dreamer sees girls crying during sleep, he expresses his regret. Who is going through this difficult period. What is the interpretation of an unmarried girl's dream? When a girl sees an unmarried woman in a dream, this proves her desire to enter into an emotional relationship and that she wants a specific person, and this indicates that she has a negative feeling. Giving birth to a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman When an unmarried woman sees that she gave birth to a girl in a dream, this proves that she will get rid of all the problems that she has been trying to get rid of for a while, and if the girl sees that a woman gave birth to a girl, this indicates a righteous husband whom God Almighty blesses with him. When a virgin who is still a student dreams that she gave birth to a girl, this indicates her success in all her academic subjects or in the subjects she was afraid of. A girl in a dream with a married woman When a married woman sees that she dreamed of a girl in her dream, this indicates the approach of pregnancy and her desire to obtain new and different things in her life. If the dreamer sees an ugly girl, this symbolizes the calamity that he will face in the coming period, and he must be patient and ask God for compensation, and there are some rumors that indicate that many problems may arise during this period. Losing a girl in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams of losing a girl in a dream, this indicates many negative things that may happen to her, such as having major disagreements with her husband, and it may also indicate a feeling of severe pressure in life. If a woman sees that there is a little girl lost in her dream or that she is her child, this indicates her inability to seize opportunities in her life, and that she will not be able to achieve her dream or desires. Seeing a little girl in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a little girl, that is, at the age of breastfeeding, this indicates that she is pregnant and desires her, especially if she has not been pregnant before. If a lady kisses a little girl in a dream, this represents the abundance of sustenance that will soon be allocated to her, especially if this girl has beautiful features and even if she is less beautiful, this indicates the problems that she will face. Thus. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream

preview.html: Although his vision is good, it varies from single to married with a man and pregnant, and in this article from an interpreter’s website we have relied on the opinions and interpretations of many dream scholars and translators.Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning fish in a dream for one girl. Cleaning raw fish in a girl’s dream indicates An unmarried woman will achieve the goals and desires she seeks. Cleaning large and multiple fish symbolizes the goals that the single girl intends to achieve, and God knows best. Also, seeing an unmarried woman cleaning a large fish indicates a short marriage with a rich person, and God is the Most High. If a married woman has finished cleaning and cooking the fish, this indicates that she will soon achieve what she desires. In general, seeing cleaning raw fish in a girl’s dream means getting rid of negative and destructive feelings. Seeing a female student cleaning fish is a symbol of success, excellence, and moving to a new educational stage. But If a girl sees in a dream that she is catching fish and cleaning them, this indicates her ability to overcome problems. If an unmarried woman sees that she is cleaning a small fish, this indicates that she will fall into a big problem that may take a long time to solve. Seeing a single woman cleaning fish may indicate She is a girl who loves everyone and wishes everyone well. If one girl sees that she is cleaning tilapia fish, this is a sign to continue the path she is on. A girl who knows that she is doing bad things and sees herself cleaning fish will be able to give up what she is doing. If the girl is engaged and sees that she is She removes the scales from the fish, this indicates that her engagement to this young man has been cancelled. See also: Seeing raw fish in a dream for divorced, married and single women. Interpretation of watching cleaning fish in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself cleaning fish in a dream, this means that she hears good news, by God. I know. But if a woman cleans fish in the kitchen, this will lead to good food arriving at her home. In addition, the dream indicates that the dreamer will attend an important and joyful event in the coming days, God willing. Seeing fish in a married woman’s dream is a symbol of getting rid of problems. And the difficulties she faces in life. Cooking fish after cleaning the family in a woman’s dream indicates that she praises a life of calm and stability. If a married woman cleans a large fish, this symbolizes getting rid of a debt in one step. Seeing the fish cleaned can be good news for the dreamer Who did not give birth, and that she will become pregnant soon, and God is the Most High. title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing sports shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing sports shoes in a dream? Sports shoes have a great meaning for all people, but if the dreamer sees them in a dream, whether he is a player or not, then they have many different meanings, and we will learn them through the interpretations provided to us by the chief interpreter. Dreams, for this reason, continued. Interpretation of seeing sports shoes in a dream. There is important evidence for seeing this dream, including this. The great goodness that meets the path and vision of this dreamer is a clear indication of the ability of the dreamer to perform all his duties and responsibilities to the fullest. If this dreamer complains of an illness Or illness, then this vision was good news for overcoming this adversity. If he appeared in the dream in green, then this indicates his continuous journey to distant lands for the purpose of study and knowledge, and it could also be evidence of his trip for Hajj in the near future. And if it was black in the vision, then this It confirms that there are many stressful problems for the dreamer in his life, which puts him in a very bad psychological state, and this may be evidence of searching for travel to increase his money. As for the brown color, it is a sign of irresponsibility and the viewer may be known to rely on others to solve their problems, no matter how simple they are. You have A dream that confuses you while waiting for it... An Egyptian Google site for dream interpretation. If the dreamer sees that its color is gray in a dream, this indicates that he is preparing for marriage, and if its color is blue, then this indicates the death of someone he values ​​very much. If he sees that it is tying him in a dream, this indicates On his great success, and if he sees himself in the presence of someone, this confirms that there is a major problem in his work, which may make him lose that job. If the dreamer sees that these shoes are for children, this indicates his bad psychological state resulting from the neglect of those around him and everything that he is going through. With him, where there is no one to relieve him of his problems or share with him. His pain. When he sees in a dream that he is comfortable with the dreamer and wants to take it off, it shows the dreamer’s desire to have a good time, as he feels a lot of pressure surrounding him and wants to rest in a quiet place. If the dreamer sees that there are a large number of shoes in his vision, this confirms great comfort Which he will enjoy and will be in unparalleled generosity and kindness. If it is made of leather, this is a sure sign that there is great strife between him and his family. Interpretation of a dream about wearing sports shoes: The meaning of this dream changes depending on the dreamer’s condition and the color of the shoe, so we see that it expresses: If its color is red In a dream, this indicates the good morals of the fortuneteller, which makes him friendly with his family and friends and tries to get close to them constantly. But if it is green, this indicates lawful money and that God will increase his provision as a result of his search for what is lawful without what is forbidden. We also find that the yellow color is a sign Very bad in the dreamer’s life, as it indicates that he does not take advantage of the good opportunities in his life, but rather leaves them without taking advantage of them. This dream is a sign of getting out of debt and overcoming everything that worries the dreamer in his life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing sports shoes. Interpretation of seeing shoes in a dream for a son Sirin, the great imam Ibn Sirin tells us

title: Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a familiar person

preview.html: Its interpretations varied, including monitoring the conversation on the phone, whether with a known or unknown person, and through the website gptafser.com/ we will talk about this in detail, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a phone call from a familiar person in a dream for one girl. To see a conversation on the phone with an unmarried woman, this It means that something good is coming from her or that she will communicate with a man she loves. When seeing a single woman talking on the phone, this person was also far away from her. It indicates that she may be in a relationship with someone who was previously married or that she will be the second wife of that man, and God knows best. Seeing her talking with a familiar person is a harbinger of a big problem for the single woman due to her association with a bad man. A single woman sees a phone call from a close family member, telling her that someone close to her has died. The vision symbolizes the arrival of happy news that she will soon hear about the family. See also: The meaning of seeing a mobile phone, cell phone, or telephone in a dream. Interpretation of monitoring a phone call from a known person in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a familiar face, he calls her, and this person is her husband. This vision is one of the good visions that indicates an abundance of sustenance, and indicates an improvement in marital life between them. It also indicates that the good news will reach her soon and will change her husband’s condition for the better. What if she finds herself sad while talking to him on the phone. It symbolizes the outbreak of heated discussions between her and her husband, and God knows best. If he sees that he is talking on the phone with an unknown person. An indication of... She will be exposed to problems that threaten her marital life in the coming period. When a stranger speaks to her in a bad way, this is a sign that someone is thinking of harming her, so she must be careful. It also indicates that she is in a relationship with someone outside the family. Likewise, if someone speaks to her Close to her, this indicates that she has a good relationship and is loved by the family. If a married woman receives a call from her son and asks for her help. This vision is not good and indicates that something bad will happen to the family or to her son. Interpretation of seeing a phone call from a well-known person and the dream is for a man and its meaning is seeing a man He receives a phone call from someone he knows if he is married. It symbolizes marital comfort and happiness between the family and children. The vision is also different if he is married and does not have children, symbolizing the love of the family and parents towards him and their satisfaction. If a man is talking on the phone with his wife and the marital relationship between them is tense, Marital strife. The vision symbolizes resolving these disputes and improving the family situation between them. If he spoke to a well-known person and the call was sudden and problematic. It indicates that he will soon face an imbalance in his relationship with this person or see from him an event that will raise major disagreements between them. If a familiar person appears In a dream, he found the call unintelligible. Evidence of an embarrassing situation between him and this person, but it will end soon. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about my husband talking on the phone. The meaning of seeing a phone call from a familiar person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation if she receives a call from a familiar person.

title: Dreams show the magic of turmoil

preview.html: Dreams that show the magic of disorder Magic is a frightening thing that frightens many people, and dreams that indicate the magic of disorder can be identified through the following: There are many indications of the presence of magic or someone’s desire to harm and disrupt the marriage. When a person sees poisons in a dream, or sees that you are being poisoned. In a dream, this indicates the presence of magic. In the case of seeing scorpions or vipers and snakes in a dream, a person seeing these things is frightening and their interpretation is one of the terrifying and repulsive things, as it indicates the presence of magic. When you see a dark black animal, a dog or a cat, or you see a pig Scary, with red sparks in his eyes, this is evidence of the presence of magic and envy, and God is Most High and most knowledgeable of it. If you see urine or feces in a dream repeatedly and continuously, this is evidence of the presence of onlookers and haters in your life who want to harm you and disrupt the marriage. It is also evidence of the presence of magic. And envy. Seeing wizards or jinn in a dream is conclusive evidence of the presence of magic in your life. When you hear music in a dream, it is evidence of the presence of magic and a lack of closeness to God Almighty. When you see graves in a dream, or see slaughtered birds, this is evidence of the presence of magic. The dream A warning from God Almighty and an indication to take the necessary measures for a speedy recovery. The dreamer must insist on reading Ayat Al-Kursi for two days, read Al-Mu’adin and Surat Al-Fatihah, and work on playing Surat Al-Baqarah constantly at home and when sleeping to avoid nightmares and unwanted dreams. It is necessary to monitor Continuously reciting morning and evening remembrances and reciting Surah Al-Baqarah and the legal ruqyah. It is best for a person to perform ablution before sleeping, and to continue playing Surah Al-Baqarah next to him during his sleep, and to continue performing the five daily prayers on time. Symptoms of sorcery: annulment of marriage. Sorcery is not a matter of superstition, but rather sorcery from what is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, where it says God Almighty: “And the devils followed what the devils read to King Solomon, and Solomon did not believe in it, but the devils refused to teach magic.” Of people. From the public.” This can be recognized by the following. Many work to go to sorcerers and charlatans to do magic on a person, and work to disrupt the marriage, because initially the person did not realize that he was bewitched. Over time, symptoms of magical marital disorder appear as a person suffering from migraines without Clear reasons or a clear diagnosis. The sufferer feels anxious and suffocated, wants to cry, suffers from a bad mood, especially in the middle of the night, loses focus and is distracted. Feeling of constant abstinence from marriage, complete rejection of the idea of ​​marriage, and the poor opinion of others. Feeling of extreme insomnia and inability to Sleeping comfortably, as you are in a constant state of anxiety and tension. Feeling severe pain in the stomach and being exposed to many disorders in the digestive system, especially if this magic is put in food or drink. Feeling severe pain in the lower back, feeling a desire to isolate, and stay away. About people and not getting involved with anyone. Seeing many...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream in full detail?

preview.html: The interpretation of the vision in a dream is complete from the books of scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, as well as through the Trend website specializing in interpretation, and this dream is only a continuation of the article. Why do the eyes dream in a dream? They say that if a person sees in a complete dream that he suffers from poor eyesight or weakness In sight, this has many indicators. This testifies to the dreamer’s instability in his life, his unwillingness to make informed decisions, and his inability to distinguish between good and evil, right and wrong, and God knows best. But if a person sees himself in a dream full of sharp gaze and clear vision, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys With a strong personality, an excellent mind, wisdom and justice, and God knows best. But if he sees himself completely infallible in a dream or does not see himself because of something before his eyes, this indicates that the dreamer has persistence and determination that allows him to achieve his goals and desires, and God knows best. Why dream of a magic eye Leading experts in dream interpretation say that seeing the magic eye in a dream means approaching danger or that he will suffer from treachery and treachery, and God knows best. Why dream of an eye injury? We found in many interpretation books that eye damage during sleep indicates that the dreamer is always described as arrogant and suffering from an illness. Myself, and God knows best. But if the eye is damaged in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer will be betrayed or betrayed by a loved one and see better. Why do you dream of hollow eyes? Our translators explained that gouging out a whole eye in a dream or gouging out a whole eye in a dream may It indicates that there are dangers in the dreamer’s life, and he may suffer from the loss of someone close to him, and God knows best. Seeing a beautiful eye in a perfect dream. They say that when a person sees a beautiful eye in a perfect dream, this indicates that the person who has the vision is a good person who is close to God and keeps his prayers, and God knows best. Seeing red and blue eyes in a dream is complete. They say that when a person sees a blue eye in a dream, this indicates Until the dreamer may commit sins and immoral behavior. If you see a red eye in the dream, the air indicates that the dreamer will suffer from competition and problems in his life, and God knows best. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.
